typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dlmovedb
dlmovedb derive(movie = lower(movie),
		title = upper(title),
		genres = lower(genres)) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns sink(input(
		movieid as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		rating as double,
		rotton as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movieid = movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		rating = Rating,
		rotton = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinktodb
